titleStmt.title: Aesop's fables English and Latin : every one whereof is divided into its distinct periods, marked with figures : so that little children being used to write and translate them may not only more exactly understand all the rules of grammar but also learn to imitate the right composition of words and the proper forms of speech belonging to both languages / by Charles Hoole.
titleStmt.author: Hoole, Charles, 1610-1667.
Aesop.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R.E. for the Company of Stationers,

notesStmt.note: English and Latin on facing pages.
Imperfect: pages cropped and tightly bound with loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
